edu.bu.segrelab.comets
Class CometsLoader

java.lang.Object
  edu.bu.segrelab.comets.CometsLoader

public abstract class CometsLoader
extends java.lang.Object

The CometsLoader class is the interface between the Comets class and any packages that do the hard work of simulations (e.g., those classes in the edu.bu.segrelab.comets.fba package).

Internally, extensions of this class should handle making sure the members of the package are loaded.

Externally, this class is used to load a layout file, model file(s), and all the various trappings of a simulation, and hold those for the Comets main class.

For example, code might look like this:
Comets c = new Comets();
CometsLoader loader = new CometsLoader();
int r = loader.loadLayoutFile("layout.txt", c);
World2D world = loader.getWorld();
Model[] modelArr = loader.getModels();
ArrayList cellList = loader.getCells();
.
.
.
and so on.

Author:
briehl

CometsLoader

Method Detail

loadLayoutFile

public abstract int loadLayoutFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                   Comets c)
Loads a layout file and stores the results internally, according to the file constraints set up by the extending package.

Parameters:
filename - - a String for the file to be loaded.
c - - the Comets that will be linked to this package
Returns:
CometsConstants.PARAMS_OK if the loading worked, CometsConstants.PARAMS_ERROR if there was an error, CometsConstants.LOAD_CANCELED if the loading was canceled, or any other appropriate integer value.

getWorld

public abstract World2D getWorld()
Retrieves the world loaded by this CometsLoader or null

Returns:
a freshly loaded World2D

getModels

public abstract Model[] getModels()
Retrieves the array of Models loaded.

Returns:
an array of Models

getCells

public abstract java.util.ArrayList getCells()
Fetches an ArrayList of loaded cells.

Returns:
an ArrayList of Cells

saveLayoutFile

public abstract void saveLayoutFile(java.lang.String path,
                                    World2D world,
                                    java.util.ArrayList cellList,
                                    CometsParameters cParams)
Saves the state of the world in a new layout file, using the format given by the extending package.

Parameters:
path - - the path and filename to be saved
world - - the current World2D to be saved
cellList - - the set of Cells in the world
cParams - - the current set of parameters to be saved
